decks.notes: This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive and efficient red creatures and burn spells. The goal is to apply pressure early on with low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Zurgo Bellstriker, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Hellkite and Ruination to close out the game if it goes long. By maintaining a fast pace and constantly applying pressure to the opponent's life total, this deck aims to end the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize and turn the tide.

This deck centers around the commander Grenzo, Dungeon Warden, who allows the player to put cards from the bottom of their library into the battlefield. The deck focuses on aggressive Goblin creatures that synergize well with Grenzo's ability. It includes cards like Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin and Siege-Gang Commander to generate a swarm of Goblins, as well as Goblin Chieftain and Goblin Warchief to boost their power. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and Lightning Bolt to deal with threats, and utility cards like Conspicuous Snoop and Goblin Recruiter to search for specific creatures. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful Goblin army, utilizing Grenzo's ability to gain an advantage.
